content: गजः [गज्-मदे अच्] {@--1@} An elephant; कचाचितौ विश्वगिवागजौ गजौ <ls>Ki. 1. 36.</ls> {@--2@} The number ‘eight’. {@--3@} A measure of length, a {%Gaja%} or yard, (thus defined:--साधारणनरांगुल्या त्रिंशदंगुलको गजः). {@--4@} A demon killed by Śiva. {@--5@} One of the eight elephants of the quarters.
